messages.content: What is the purpose of the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
The pose-generator-comfyui-node is used to generate OpenPose poses and build character reference sheets in ComfyUI with ease.
What is required to install the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
You need to clone the repo into the `custom_nodes/cozy-pose-generator` directory and run `pip install -r requirements.txt` to install the required dependencies.
Are there any example workflows for using the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
Yes, there is an example workflow called 'Cozy Character Face Generator - ComfyUI SD 1.5 Workflow For Reference Sheets', which can be found at the provided link.
What is the function of the face reference in the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
The face reference in the pose-generator-comfyui-node helps in generating facial poses for character reference sheets.
What is the function of the body reference in the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
The body reference in the pose-generator-comfyui-node helps in generating body poses for character reference sheets.
